questions.question_text: An organization has acquired a new system with strict maintenance instructions and schedules. Where should this information be documented?
The PRIMARY benefit of using http secure (https) is that it provides:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. confidentiality of data transmitted.

choices.B: Employees use smartphone tethering when accessing from remote locations.
choices.A: Employees are trained on the acceptable use policy.
choices.C: Employees use the VPN when accessing the organization's online resources.
choices.D: Employees physically lock PCs when leaving the immediate area.

discussion.content: C - Use the VPN when accessing the organization’s online resources is crucial. VPNs encrypt communication, ensuring confidentiality and secure access. This directly mitigates risks associated with remote connections. Option A is it is not the most critical concern when providing remote access to employees. Acceptable use policies cover general guidelines, but they don’t directly address the security of remote connections.

Selected Answer: A
Option A cover all the B, C, D.

All options are important but A will cover the remaining options.

To improve an organization's information security culture, it is MOST important for senior management to:

A critical server for a hospital has been encrypted by ransomware. The hospital is unable to function effectively without this server. Which of the following would
MOST effectively allow the hospital to avoid paying the ransom?

choices.C: A properly tested offline backup system

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
B & D is more on preventive steps. A will only result in extension of the ransomware....do C is it :)

Selected Answer: C
Continual server replication will also mean the ransomware replicate over to the other server. So offline backup system is the most effective against ransomware provided it is tested regularly.
C. A properly tested offline backup system

Selected Answer: C
A properly tested offline backup system would be the most effective way to avoid paying the ransom in this scenario. With a proper offline backup system, the hospital would be able to recover the encrypted server without paying the ransom. Continual server replication, employee training on ransomware, and a properly configured firewall may help prevent ransomware attacks, but they would not help the hospital avoid paying the ransom in this scenario.
